page.title: 14Recreation -Powburn Area
page.content:
There are three main clubs for grownups in our area. The first is the 'Over Sixties Club'. This is held in Powburn every month. The second is the Womens' Institute which is held in Powburn monthly and the third is the indoor bowls club which meets in Powburn weekly.
Several of the men from this area enjoy playing cricket for a neighbouring village team (Eglingham). The fathers of five children froim this school are involved in Rugby at Alnwick.
Women from this area who want to attend WeightWatchers Club have to go to Wooler or Alnwick. Keep Fit classes have also been well supported by several mothers of children in our school.
